item.title: Are You Fed Up Yet?
item.description:
[caption id="attachment_1254" align="alignright" width="300" caption="mdanys on Flickr"][/caption]

“Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.” - Pope John XXIII

I am fed up with reading about all these ways to make things happen, with making plans and taking false starts. You might recall my response to The 4-Hour Workweek, in which I established a very doable plan that ultimately got sidetracked. All I got out of that experience was a new way to see the world which ought to enable me to live the life I want. It freed me from accepting the normal path and got me to thinking that I can design my own life. But from what I can see I never actually went past designing it.

I have to wonder why.
